item.title: Switch statement for npc drops?
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

im trying to add a switch statement for npc drops
but it doesnt drop items (kinda like my mage handler not dealing damage which i still havent fixed)
ive tried to diffrent ways

one where i use NPCID for the switch and one with my own

(NPCID)

switch(NPCID) {

(own)

int npcid = npcs[NPCID].npcType = NPCID;

switch(npcid) {

(full - latest version)

[code] public void MonsterDropItem(int NPCID)
{
{
if (IsDropping == false) {
IsDropping = true;
int Play = GetNpcKiller(NPCID);
int Maxi = server.itemHandler.DropItemCount;
for (int i = 0; i <= Maxi; i++) {
if (server.itemHandler.DroppedItemsID[i] > 0) {
} else {
int NPCID2 = NPCID+34;
System.out.println(“Npc id =” +NPCID);
if(npcs[NPCID] != null && server.playerHandler.players[Play] != null && server.playerHandler.players[GetNpcKiller(NPCID)] != null) {

int npcid = npcs[NPCID].npcType = NPCID;

switch(npcid) {

case 81: // cows
case 397:
case 955:
case 1767:
case 1766:
case 1868:
case 2310:
ItemHandler.addItem(1739, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
ItemHandler.addItem(2530, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
ItemHandler.addItem(2132, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
break;

case 1: // men/woman
case 2:
case 3:
case 4:
case 5:
case 6:
case 16:
case 24:
case 25:
ItemHandler.addItem(2530, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
ItemHandler.addItem(995, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 3, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
break;

case 41: // chickens
ItemHandler.addItem(314, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 3, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
ItemHandler.addItem(2530, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
break;

case 1757: // forgot
case 7:
case 137:
case 1758:
ItemHandler.addItem(995, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 9, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
ItemHandler.addItem(2530, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
break;

}
